thread.title: Small, cozy and quiet hotel close to Champs-Élysées
thread.title_full: Small, cozy and quiet hotel close to Champs-Élysées - Review of Hotel Ekta, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: SaraDragonite
title: Small, cozy and quiet hotel close to Champs-Élysées
text: Great, small hotel close to Champs-Élysées, Arc de Triomphe and Metro station. Quiet street. Good breakfast. Fun interior design. We had a great stay in a suite with two small rooms, one with big bed for the parents and one bunk bed for the kids. Two basins and a shower between the rooms. Good idea to rent portable wifi when outdoors.
